content.body: If the expression is a valid left-hand-side expression then you can also use it to update the value. If it isn't then I think updating the value is impossible because there is no variable (or object property) in the generated code that corresponds to the original variable (usually because the variable's value got inlined).

FWIW we should update this example from the proposal - since the generated code also contains a variable `n` for the bigint, the expression in the sourcemap should be `n` (and hence it could be updated).
content.formatted_body: FWIW we should update this example from the proposal - since the generated code also contains a variable n for the bigint, the expression in the sourcemap should be n (and hence it could be updated).

content.body: I would also be fine with a linear encoding (in fact an earlier version of my proposal did that)
